entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 70 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
